# Dotfiles

| Type              | Program                               |
|-------------------|---------------------------------------|
| Window Manager    | XMonad                                |
| Bar               | eww                                   |
| Compositor        | Picom Pijulius                        |
| Terminal Emulator | kitty                                 |
| Editor            | Neovim                                |
| Editor            | Doom Emacs                            |
| File Manager      | Thunar                                |
| Launcher          | Rofi                                  |
| GTK Theme         | Catppuccin Mocha Standard Maroon Dark |
| Cursor Theme      | Catppucin Mocha Dark Cursors          |
